```{python}
from pathlib import Path

import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
```

```{python}
csv_path = Path('original') / 'MB_SMB_D_BMB_ann.csv'
df = pd.read_csv(csv_path)
df.head()
```

```{python}
df.plot(x='time', y='MB')
```

```{python}
df['MB_10_rolling'] = df.rolling(window=10)['MB'].mean()
```

```{python}
fig, ax = plt.subplots(1, 1)
df.plot(x='time', y='MB', marker='+', linestyle='dotted', ax=ax)
df.plot(x='time', y='MB_10_rolling', ax=ax);
```

```{python}
xls_path = Path('original') / 'global_basin_timeseries.xlsx'
df = pd.read_excel(xls_path, sheet_name='Global')
df = df.rename(columns={'Unnamed: 0': 'time'})
df.head()
```
